mapper.update: update app_ap_opening_balance set ap_opening_balance_id = #{apOpeningBalanceId}, vendor_id = #{vendorId}, date = #{date}, invoice_no = #{invoiceNo}, purchase_order_no = #{purchaseOrderNo}, currency_id = #{currencyId}, payable_value = #{payableValue}, term_of_payment_id = #{termOfPaymentId} where ap_opening_balance_id = #{apOpeningBalanceId};
